skins.shipDescription: Wichita-class heavy cruiser C Wichita, Hull Number CA-45! Unlock build after receiving
skins.selfIntroduction: I am the one and only fearless general of the seas, Lady Wichita! Even carriers would be crushed beneath my feet, if I wanted to end them myself. That's why, Commander, I'll be expecting much of you.
skins.acquisition: You're the commander? Very well. Starting today you will be my adviser. You will devote your time to helping me conquer the seas!
skins.login: You've returned. You really kept me waiting. Get ready to depart.
skins.details: Relish in the power of a true heavy cruiser!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Look! Our conquest extends to the ends of this blue sea!
skins.secretaryIdle3: There exists no problem that a shot from my huge cannons cannot resolve!
skins.secretaryTouch: What is it, want to have a go with me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Are you trying to get a taste of my whip?

skins.JPClientName: ジェネラル?バンケット
skins.shipDescription: It's about time you showed up, Commander. Now, show me some spirit! As my lieutenant, don't do anything slovenly that would incur the mockery of others! Very well, let's move out!
skins.acquisition: It's about time you showed up, Commander. Now, show me some spirit! As my lieutenant, don't do anything slovenly that would incur the mockery of others! Very well, let's move out!
skins.login: What took you so long, Commander?
skins.details: Mannerisms, etiquette, dress codes... Hmph. This is all more convoluted than naval battles, that's for sure. Still, I agreed to participate, so I mustn't act like a total simpleton.
skins.secretaryIdle1: What are you looking at? You want a drink, huh? Why didn't you just say so right away?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Even the world's best warrior would succumb to exhaustion if they never stopped fighting. Everyone needs time off for recreation, you know? So enjoy yourself tonight.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Not going to lie, St. Louis's car looked really slick. I'm considering asking for the keys and taking it for a spin later.
skins.secretaryTouch: Hey! You nearly put your hand on my shoulder there... Try to avoid doing that in public at the very least.

skins.shipDescription: Tonight I am not a renowned naval general, I am a feared commander of witches! And you... Yes, you're not my lieutenant, you are my arcane familiar!
skins.acquisition: Tonight I am not a renowned naval general, I am a feared commander of witches! And you... Yes, you're not my lieutenant, you are my arcane familiar!
skins.login: The curtain rises on All Hallows' Eve! Commander, we're leaving!
skins.details: Darkness may unnerve people, but you need some well-placed lighting to truly frighten them. So, tell me, Commander: have any ideas for setting up a Halloween scene?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Ghosts? Goblins? Hah! On this night, they too are under my control! Hahahaha!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Trick-or-treaters? It's your job to deal with those. Wouldn't want to risk petrifying any children with my terrific costume.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Raising the brim of my witch hat to reveal my razor-sharp fangs C now that's what I'm talking about!
skins.secretaryTouch: Come, familiar. Get up on the pumpkin and take in the Halloween spirit.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Desperate to once more taste the sting of my whip, are we?
